alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coffee County through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Douglas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Broxton, Ambrose, Nicholls and West Green. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
